Hello! My name is Chenghong, currently I’m a first year PhD student studying Artificial Intelligence at Northwestern University. I became a PhD student from Fall 2020 in Qualitative Reasoning Group (QRG) led by Ken Forbus. My current research interests lie in the realm of reasoning systems and natural language processing, and how they can be applied to handle commonsense reasoning tasks.
During my free time, I usually run 2-3 miles on a daily basis and I occassionally read books as well.
